title: Poppy Update
body: Dear Riot, I was just making this discussion to tell you that in part of the Poppy Update, some of her abilities (if you click on the champion and go to her abilities) I think it has the right description but the wrong video with it (I noticed with her ult) so I was wondering if that is something wrong with my patch or every patch in general? Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey Jake Lorenzo,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and we'll be fixing it!
